116.movie_plot: Christy Brown, born with cerebral palsy, learns to paint and write with his only controllable limb - his left foot.

57.movie_plot: A small town police chief awaits the arrival of a gang of killers.

109.movie_plot: The discovery of a severed human ear found in a field leads a young man on an investigation related to a beautiful, mysterious nightclub singer and a group of psychopathic criminals who have kidnapped her child.

107.movie_plot: Brian is born on the original Christmas, in the stable next door. He spends his life being mistaken for a messiah.
